name: lecture-logger
description: An app to log lectures into an Excel spreadsheet
author: Andrew Jolley <andrew@jolley.dev> (UI/Frontend), Liam Shadwell (Python Backend)

scripts.dist: npm run clean && electron-builder -mw --config.directories.output=dist/$npm_package_version/$npm_package_buildNumber && npm run move-installers
scripts.dist:mac: npm run clean && electron-builder --mac --config.directories.output=dist/$npm_package_version/$npm_package_buildNumber && npm run move-installers
scripts.dist:win: npm run clean && electron-builder --win --config.directories.output=dist/$npm_package_version/$npm_package_buildNumber && npm run move-installers
scripts.dist:linux: npm run clean && electron-builder --linux --config.directories.output=dist/$npm_package_version/$npm_package_buildNumber && npm run move-installers
scripts.move-installers: mkdir -p '/Users/andrewjolley/Setup Files/v$npm_package_version' && find dist/ -name '*.dmg' -exec mv {} '/Users/andrewjolley/Setup Files/v$npm_package_version/' \; && find dist/ -name '*Setup*.exe' -exec mv {} '/Users/andrewjolley/Setup Files/v$npm_package_version/' \; && find dist/ -name '*.AppImage' -exec mv {} '/Users/andrewjolley/Setup Files/v$npm_package_version/' \;
